about_the_game:
This DLC contains five digital double-sided dakimakuras, featuring the main heroines of Love Esquire: Kamala, Beatrice, Vel, Giselle and Amy.

One side is naughtier than the other. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Resolution: 2953x9449

You can find the dakimakuras inside your Steam game folder.

content_descriptors.notes: The other side of the dakimakuras contain partial nudity (no genitals are shown).

detailed_description:
This DLC contains five digital double-sided dakimakuras, featuring the main heroines of Love Esquire: Kamala, Beatrice, Vel, Giselle and Amy.

One side is naughtier than the other. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Resolution: 2953x9449

You can find the dakimakuras inside your Steam game folder.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 260 or equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.5 or higher
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Love Esquire - Digital Dakimakuras

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 260 or equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
